title: Month 2 Final Exam: Executive Review
description: 15 questions evaluating Month 2 topics: investment, risk management, M&A, and executive reporting.

items.question: Which document provides a high-level summary for senior decision-makers?
items.explanation: Executive summaries highlight the most important parts of a report.

items.question: The analyst ________ (confirm) that the synergies would save $5 million.
What is 'Diversification'?
items.explanation: Diversification is a key risk management strategy.

items.question: An insurance 'Premium' is:
items.explanation: Premiums are paid to the insurer.

items.question: The stock market is crashing. Investors ________ (be) very worried.
What is 'Due Diligence'?
options: A comprehensive appraisal of a target company
items.answer: A comprehensive appraisal of a target company
items.explanation: Due diligence is essential in M&A.

items.question: A 'Benchmark' is used to:
items.explanation: Performance is compared against a standard.

items.question: By next month, the integration team ________ (complete) the first phase.
Which term describes 'intangible value like brand reputation'?
items.explanation: Goodwill is an intangible asset in M&A.

items.question: The CEO ________ (deny) that the company was for sale.
An LBO uses ________ to buy a company.
The auditor ________ (not / find) any errors; he looks very relaxed.
Synergy in M&A means:
items.explanation: Synergy is the goal of most mergers.

items.question: We ________ (be) managing over $1 billion by the end of the year.
